channel.title: Motivation and Data Gathering on With Subtle Notes of Dry Summer Rain
channel.description: Recent content in Motivation and Data Gathering on With Subtle Notes of Dry Summer Rain

item.title: A Brief Introduction
item.description: Network distribution? Hvis de har høje ratings, har de så også de samme ord? Enkelte ord burde vel stå ud?

item.title: Data Preprocessing and Statistics
item.description:
All the data gathered needs to be processed in order to be useful. Take user 38077555’s review:
‘🕰2021
💯88/100 🌟3.8
👁Pale pink
👃👄Slt sweet, strawberry, raspberry, faint English cucumber, fizzy, med acidity, med finish
🍇Pinot Noir
🕰️No tech notes available
⛽12.1%ABV
💵$15 MSRP
Wine tasting at local wine shop, second wine
Brought my own wineglass as they serve in stemless generic.’
It contains emojies that hold little informative value out of context. The reviews are filtered by the provided language tag from Vivino for only reviews they classify as being in English.

item.title: What does different wine type taste like?
What does good wine taste like?
item.description: Det virker komplet random om det her virker… For at være helt ærlig…
